td.div:
Please ensure all items are received in good condition and meet the specifications listed. If there are any issues or discrepancies, contact us immediately to
store@voyagemarine.ae
Please confirm receipt of this delivery order and provide any feedback at your earliest convenience.

p.i: We appreciate your business and look forward to serving you again in the future.

span.i:
A) By accepting the delivery order, you acknowledge that the goods listed have been received in good condition, unless otherwise specified with in 5days.
B) Ownership and risk of loss or damage to the goods transfer to you upon delivery. From that point onward, it is your responsibility to protect the goods and assume any associated risks.
C) General Terms and condition shall apply for this order agreement.

td.div: A professional Supplier and Service provider for All Electrical & Instrumentation, Automation & Control, Fire & Safety, Navigation and Communication and Calibration requirements for Marine, Oil & Gas and Energy Industry.
